org.openbel.framework.common.lock
Interface Lockable

All Known Implementing Classes:
LockAdviser
public interface Lockable

Lockable defines an object which can be locked for both reading and writing. The user of this lockable must obtain the LockAdviser.Lock before processing and release the LockAdviser.Lock after processing.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Method Summary
 LockAdviser.Lock obtainReadLock()
          Attempts to obtain a read lock from the target lockable.
 LockAdviser.Lock obtainWriteLock()
          Attempts to obtain a write lock from the target lockable.
 void releaseReadLock(LockAdviser.Lock lock)
          Attempts to release a read lock from the target lockable.
 void releaseWriteLock(LockAdviser.Lock lock)
          Attempts to release a write lock from the target lockable
 

Method Detail

obtainReadLock

LockAdviser.Lock obtainReadLock()
Attempts to obtain a read lock from the target lockable.

Returns:
the read lock, or null if it could not be obtained

obtainWriteLock

LockAdviser.Lock obtainWriteLock()
Attempts to obtain a write lock from the target lockable.

Returns:
the write lock, or null if it could not be obtained

releaseReadLock

void releaseReadLock(LockAdviser.Lock lock)
Attempts to release a read lock from the target lockable.

Parameters:
lock - the read lock to release from the target lockable, which cannot be null or have an invalid lock name
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if lock is null, or has an invalid lock name
IllegalStateException - Thrown if the read lock file could not be deleted immediately

releaseWriteLock

void releaseWriteLock(LockAdviser.Lock lock)
Attempts to release a write lock from the target lockable

Parameters:
lock - the write lock to release from the target lockable, which cannot be null or have an invalid lock name
Throws:
InvalidArgument - Thrown if lock is null, or has an invalid lock name
IllegalStateException - Thrown if the write lock file could not be deleted immediately
